# Links

## Inline Links

[Basic link](https://example.com)

[Link with title](https://example.com "Visit Example")

[Relative link](/blog/my-post)

[Anchor link](#links)

## Reference-Style Links

Here is a [reference link][example] and another [one][docs].

[example]: https://example.com
[docs]: https://example.com/docs "Documentation"

## Autolinks

<https://example.com>

<user@example.com>

## Links in Context

Read the [installation guide](https://example.com/install) before proceeding. For troubleshooting, see the [FAQ](https://example.com/faq "Frequently Asked Questions") or contact [support](mailto:support@example.com).

Multiple links in one sentence: [Rails](https://rubyonrails.org), [Ruby](https://ruby-lang.org), and [Lexxy](https://github.com/basecamp/lexxy).
